title: Meigyoku no Almaine - Novel Updates
author: Toshihiko Tsukiji
description:
With a king falling in love with Almaine’s mother at first sight. He became a part of the Fimmelhausen dynasty. However, one day... the ten-year-old learned of his mother’s death and became keenly aware of the royal family’s repulsive nature from an incident with Hiltrud, his beautiful elder sister. As a result, he fled from the palace.

From there, he spent eight years roaming the continent when his matured younger sister, Naria, appeared before him as a knight. Reluctantly, Almaine returned to the palace for a time, but would be met with the harsh fate of the royal family, captive to their blood…>
